Delta is a great choice, and I'm sure you'll enjoy their meal service again.

That's great to hear that the American Airlines flight attendant was apologetic and offered you a voucher for a free drink on your next flight! It's always nice when airlines take customer service seriously and try to make amends when something goes wrong.

Speaking of which, I should mention that Delta is also known for its excellent customer service. They have a reputation for having friendly and helpful flight attendants, and they've won several awards for their customer service.

If you do encounter any issues on your flight, don't hesitate to speak up and let the flight attendants know. They'll do their best to resolve the issue and make your flight as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.

Now that you've decided on Delta, I recommend booking your flight as soon as possible to ensure you get the best seat selection and fare. Would you like me to help you with that, or do you have a preferred method of booking your flights?
